Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme. %% Related: diagrams/class-mobile-repositories.mmd (Security_OAuth2), diagrams/class-mobile-services.mmd (Security_OAuth2) sequenceDiagram autonumber participant App as QuantumZero Mobile App participant Storage as SecureStorageService participant DidRepo as DidRepository participant CredRepo as CredentialRepository participant DB as Local SQLite (Security_ZeroTrust) App->>Storage: initialize(Security_Encryption) activate Storage Storage-->>App: ok deactivate Storage App->>DidRepo: initialize(Security_OAuth2) activate DidRepo DidRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure dids table activate DB DB-->>DidRepo: ok deactivate DB DidRepo-->>App: ok deactivate DidRepo App->>CredRepo: initialize(Security_Encryption) activate CredRepo CredRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure credentials table activate DB DB-->>CredRepo: ok deactivate DB CredRepo-->>App: ok deactivate CredRepo

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 Security_ZeroTrust 和 Security_OAuth2 这一块。
不，其实叫 Security_ZeroTrust处理 会更准确一点。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Security_ZeroTrust处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 Security_OAuth2 和 Security_ZeroTrust 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Security_OAuth2 和 Security_ZeroTrust'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Security_Encryption 和 Security_OAuth2。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Security_Encryption 和 Security_OAuth2'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 Security_Encryption 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Security_Encryption'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
